newsitem.title: GREECE: GREEK CHARTER TOURIST ARRIVALS DOWN 11.41PCT JAN-OCT.
newsitem.headline: GREEK CHARTER TOURIST ARRIVALS DOWN 11.41PCT JAN-OCT.

text.p: Tourist arrivals on charter flights in Greece's main airports were down 11.41 percent year-on-year in the first eight months o the year based on civil aviation statistics, the National Statistics Service (NSS) said.

Based on civil aviation authority (YPA) statistics tourist arrivals on charter flights in the country's main airports- Athens, Rhodes, Corfu, Heraklion and Thessaloniki - reached 3.77 million in the period January-Octobe versus 4.256 million in the same period a year ago.
Tourist arrivals were down 13.13 percent year-on-year in October. --Dimitris Kontogiannis, Athens Newsroom +301 3311812-4
